scripts.build: npm run build:css && npm run build:js && npm run build:html
scripts.build:html: if not exist vanilla-project mkdir vanilla-project && copyfiles src\index.html vanilla-project\index.html
scripts.build:css: if not exist vanilla-project\src\css mkdir vanilla-project\src\css && copyfiles src\css\index.css vanilla-project\src\css\index.css && then
